BR_text.BRdescription:
This is actually not an issue, but a notice that gocv.NormMixMax const in fact should be gocv.NormMinMax to get aligned with the standard OpenCV NORM_MINMAX enum type.
 Here is the reference for it: <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/master/d2/de8/group__core__array.html#gad12cefbcb5291cf958a85b4b67b6149f>https://docs.opencv.org/master/d2/de8/group__core__array.html#gad12cefbcb5291cf958a85b4b67b6149f</denchmark-link>
 
 It's just a bit confusing.

comments_0.comment_text: That looks like a typo bug to me. Thanks for pointing that out, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/esimov>@esimov</denchmark-link>

comments_1.comment_text: This has been corrected in the dev branch. I will close this issue on next release.

comments_3.comment_text: This has been released as part of v0.16.0 thank you.
